ovdesc.p: From the Single Customer View, the Account opening process can be initiated. The process starts from selecting of account type. After entering the account details an Account opening letter is generated. Request for Cheque book and Debit card can be given. If the product type is "Current Account with Overdraft", a limit is created and attached with the account at the backend.

desc.p: The field "Category" holds dropdown values .Type of account can be selected from the drop down.
